title: Karati Bekhol Lev

titles.text: I Call with All My Heart

enDesc: Karati Bekhol Lev (I Call with All My Heart) is a collection of Hebrew essays on the weekly Torah portion by renowned Israeli scholar Rabbanit Dr. Michal Tikochinsky. A brief introduction describes how these essays grew out of a lifelong attraction to Torah study and a habit of studying the Torah portion each week with a range of commentaries – which gave rise to an extensive collection of questions and insights. Karati Bekhol Lev includes several essays on each Torah portion, representing a wide range of Jewish and secular scholarship, with insights informed by the author’s legal background and general literature as well as Jewish texts.
enShortDesc: 21st-century collection of Hebrew essays on the weekly Torah portion that draws from a wide range of Jewish and secular sources.
titleVariants: I Call with All My Heart
